price: 101. Ceux à qui étaient déjà promise Notre plus belle récompense, ceux-là en seront tenus éloignés.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتۡ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَنۡهَا مُبۡعَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna sabaqat lahum minnā al-ḥus'nā ulāika ʿanhā mub'ʿadūna
